|brand = D-Link |model = DES-1210 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -28 |revision = rev A1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 01/08/2021 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/D-Link_DES-1210-28_rev_A1 |series = <!-- Device series --> |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification -->
|fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Baord ID --> |ethoui = FC:75:16
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;Prestera; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v5 |cpu1spd = <!-- CPU1 speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = STMicro;S25P28V6P; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Mira;P3R12E4JFF-G8E; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E3083; |eth3chip = Marvell;88E1322; |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|lan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports=24 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=4
|sw_cpu = true |sw2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

|exp_if_types = SFP |exp_sfp_num = 2
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.4 |pwr_poe_type = <!-- Type of POE --> |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = C13
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 8-pin header,, populated,, |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, JP1
|stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |asin = B003G2OVBI |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Marvell]] Prestera (likely either 98DX1022 or 98DX2122) (ARMv5) *Flash/RAM: 16MB (SPI) Flash, 64MB RAM (DDR2) *12.8Gbps switching capacity, Rack mountable (1U, 19") *24x Fast Ethernet ports, 4x Gbe (RJ-45) ports 2 shared with SFP slots
==Links of Interest== [ftp://ftp2.dlink.com/PRODUCTS/DES-1210-28/REVA/DES-1210-28_REVA_DATASHEET_1.00_EN.PDF Datasheet]
